fields.label: Do You Want a Banner On This Page?
fields.name: page_banner_select
fields.instructions: Check the box if you would like to display a banner on this page.

fields.label: (Optional) Add a Class to the Banner
fields.name: page_banner_add_class
fields.instructions: Add a class to the banner.  Do not include a period before the class name.

fields.label: Add Padding to Banner?
fields.name: page_banner_add_padding
fields.instructions: Add padding to top and bottom of banner.   Enter in the padding using a number and measurement (em,rem,px, etc) with no spacing in between.   IE - 2rem or 30px.   Padding will be applied to top and bottom of banner.

fields.label: Choose Banner Layout
fields.name: page_banner_layout
fields.instructions: Choose the layout for the banner

fields.label: Use Background Image as Height of Banner?
fields.name: page_banner_background_height
fields.instructions: Check the box if you would like to use the height of the background image as the height of the banner.   If you leave unchecked, the banner height will be set to auto and will be determined by the content within it.

fields.label: Banner Content
fields.name: page_banner_layout_custom_content
fields.instructions: Enter the content you would like to appear in the banner area.   You can insert forms, pictures and enter in your own text.

fields.label: Headline Color
fields.name: page_banner_headline_color
fields.instructions: Select the font color of the headline

fields.label: Headline Text Shadow Color
fields.name: page_banner_headline_text_shadow_color
fields.instructions: Select the text shadow color for the headline

fields.label: Sub-Headline Color
fields.name: page_banner_subheadline_color
fields.instructions: Select the font color of the sub-headline

fields.label: Sub-Headline Text Shadow Color
fields.name: page_banner_subheadline_text_shadow_color
fields.instructions: Select the text shadow color for the sub-headline

fields.label: Call to Action #1 Link
fields.name: page_banner_cta_link
fields.instructions: Insert the page or anchor the call to action should link to.   Example - http://www.company.com/page/  or #appointment

fields.label: Text After Call to Action Button
fields.name: page_banner_after_cta_text

fields.label: Add Additional Call to Action Buttons?
fields.name: page_banner_cta_add_truefalse
fields.instructions: If you would like to add additional Call to Action buttons, check the box below.

fields.label: How Many Additional Call to Action buttons do You Want?
fields.name: page_banner_cta_add_selector
fields.instructions: Want to add more call to action buttons?  Select the number of additional call to action buttons below.

fields.label: Call to Action #2 Link
fields.name: page_banner_cta2_link
fields.instructions: Insert the page or anchor the call to action should link to.   Example - http://www.company.com/page/  or #appointment

fields.label: Call to Action #3 Link
fields.name: page_banner_cta3_link
fields.instructions: Insert the page or anchor the call to action should link to.   Example - http://www.company.com/page/  or #appointment

fields.label: Call to Action #4 Link
fields.name: page_banner_cta4_link
fields.instructions: Insert the page or anchor the call to action should link to.   Example - http://www.company.com/page/  or #appointment

fields.label: Desktop Banner
fields.instructions: Upload the image to use for the banner of the homepage

fields.label: Select Desktop Banner Background
fields.name: page_desktop_banner_bg_select
fields.instructions: Choose the type of background you want for the desktop banner

fields.label: Upload Desktop Banner Image
fields.name: page_desktop_banner_image_upload
fields.instructions: Upload the banner image to use for the desktop (large) version of your website.  Minimum width is 1920px.    This image will be used on screen sizes of 1024px wide and up.

fields.label: Select Desktop Banner Background Color
fields.name: page_desktop_banner_bg_color
fields.instructions: Choose a color to use as the background for the desktop banner

fields.label: Select Desktop Banner Background - Top Gradient Color
fields.name: page_desktop_banner_bg_color_top_gradient
fields.instructions: Choose a color to use as the starting (top) gradient color for the desktop banner

fields.label: Select Desktop Banner Background - Bottom Gradient Color
fields.name: page_desktop_banner_bg_color_bottom_gradient
fields.instructions: Choose a color to use as the starting (bottom) gradient color for the desktop banner

fields.label: Tablet Banner
fields.instructions: Upload the image to use for the banner of the homepage

fields.label: Select Tablet Banner Background
fields.name: page_tablet_banner_bg_select
fields.instructions: Choose the type of background you want for the tablet banner

fields.label: Upload Tablet Banner Image
fields.name: page_tablet_banner_image_upload
fields.instructions: Upload the banner image to use for the tablet (medium) version of your website.  Width should be 1024px.   This image will be used on screen sizes of 640px wide to 1023px wide.

fields.label: Select Tablet Banner Background Color
fields.name: page_tablet_banner_bg_color
fields.instructions: Choose a color to use as the background for the tablet banner

fields.label: Select Tablet Banner Background - Top Gradient Color
fields.name: page_tablet_banner_bg_color_top_gradient
fields.instructions: Choose a color to use as the starting (top) gradient color for the tablet banner

fields.label: Select Tablet Banner Background - Bottom Gradient Color
fields.name: page_tablet_banner_bg_color_bottom_gradient
fields.instructions: Choose a color to use as the starting (bottom) gradient color for the tablet banner

fields.label: Mobile Banner (Landscape View)
fields.instructions: Upload the image to use for the banner of the homepage

fields.label: Select Mobile (Landscape) Background
fields.name: page_mobile_banner_bg_select
fields.instructions: Choose the type of background you want for the mobile banner.

fields.label: Upload Mobile Banner Image
fields.name: page_mobile_banner_image_upload
fields.instructions: Upload the banner image to use for the mobile version of your website.  This will image will be used for landscape view on most popular mobile phones and as portrait view on some of the larger mobile phones.   Width should be 640 px.

fields.label: Select Mobile Banner Background Color
fields.name: page_mobile_banner_bg_color
fields.instructions: Choose a color to use as the background for the mobile banner

fields.label: Select Mobile Banner Background - Top Gradient Color
fields.name: page_mobile_banner_bg_color_top_gradient
fields.instructions: Choose a color to use as the starting (top) gradient color for the mobile banner

fields.label: Select Mobile Banner Background - Bottom Gradient Color
fields.name: page_mobile_banner_bg_color_bottom_gradient
fields.instructions: Choose a color to use as the starting (bottom) gradient color for the mobile banner

fields.label: Select the Form to Display
fields.name: page_banner_form
fields.instructions: Select the form that you would like to add to the banner. You can set up a form by going to "Lead Forms" in the left hand menu of your website theme.

fields.label: MOBILE DEVICES: Form Pop-up Button Text
fields.name: page_banner_form_mobile_popup
fields.instructions: On mobile devices, we will show visitors a button that will open the form in a pop-up window.   Type the text that should appear on the button.  Leave blank if you do not want to show the form on mobile devices.
